entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
